Entries.default: "How may I be of service, my lord?"
Entries.female: "How may I be of service, my lady?"

Entries.default: "My lord, we should address the matter of our ship's resources before we get underway."
Entries.female: "My lady, we should address the matter of our ship's resources before we get underway."

Entries.default: "Who are you?"
"How did I get a ship in the first place?"
"What should I do next?"
"I was the steward of your keep at Caed Nua, my lord."
Entries.female: "I was the steward of your keep at Caed Nua, my lady."

Entries.default: "Farewell."
"With Caed Nua in ruins, there was little purpose in waxing sentimental over the rubble."
"I suggest we proceed to Neketaka, my lord. It is the largest city in Deadfire, and we shall be better able to get our bearings there."
Entries.female: "I suggest we proceed to Neketaka, my lady. It is the largest city in Deadfire, and we shall be better able to get our bearings there."

Entries.default: "I recommend that we proceed to Hasongo. If the reports are true, then Eothas may have passed through there recently."
"If Eothas has gone to Magran's Teeth, then I fear that is where we must also go, my lord."
Entries.female: "If Eothas has gone to Magran's Teeth, then I fear that is where we must also go, my lady."

Entries.default: "We have a long and dangerous journey before us, my lord. I advise you to prepare and gather your strength for the trials ahead."
Entries.female: "We have a long and dangerous journey before us, my lady. I advise you to prepare and gather your strength for the trials ahead."

Entries.default: "I think the time has come, my lord. We should sail for Ukaizo as soon as you are ready."
Entries.female: "I think the time has come, my lady. We should sail for Ukaizo as soon as you are ready."

Entries.default: "If we are to survive the journey through Ondra's Mortar, then we will require every available advantage."
"However, Port Maje appears to be well-supplied, and I expect the recent disaster has left several sailors in want of a ship."
"It saddens me to inform you that we lost several crew and most of our provisions during the storm."
"I suggest we contract for additional supplies and crew before we return to open water, or our voyage may indeed be a short one."
"I was able to salvage enough of your treasure and wealth to afford the purchase of the Defiant and the hire of a small crew. "

"Unfortunately, that consumed the remainder of your once-considerable assets. 

"Under the circumstances, I hoped you would not object."
"Long before your time, I had my soul bound to a throne of adra ban, and for nearly two hundred years, I felt Caed Nua and the comings and goings within it like an extension of myself."
"It is... a strange connection to lose."
"Still, it would be unseemly for me to complain of loss to you, my lord."
Entries.female: "Still, it would be unseemly for me to complain of loss to you, my lady."

Entries.default: "I advise proceeding with caution. Local lore paints Magran's Teeth as a most treacherous place."
"The great powers of Deadfire seem eager for your help, and all have considerable resources at their disposal."
"If you could form an alliance with one of them, I suspect they will be able to aid us, though their rivals will be none too pleased."

"Without such an alliance, this ship will need every improvement you can afford to have a chance at surviving the storms.

"Even then, it will be a most perilous journey."
"I am glad to see you in good health, my lord."
Entries.female: "I am glad to see you in good health, my lady."

Entries.default: "How may I be of service, my lord?"
Entries.female: "How may I be of service, my lady?"

Entries.default: "My lord, what do you require?"
